rule.description: ATT&CK T1103: New DLL Added to AppInit_DLLs Registry Key
rule.info: DLLs that are specified in the AppInit_DLLs value in the Registry key HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Windows are loaded by user32.dll into every process that loads user32.dll

rule.description: ATT&CK T1103: New DLL Added to AppInit_DLLs Registry Key
rule.info: DLLs that are specified in the AppInit_DLLs value in the Registry key HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Windows are loaded by user32.dll into every process that loads user32.dll
